mapper.select: select id, name, begin_date, paper_type, record_id, descipline, first_discipline, college_id, paper_source, user_id, information from scientific_research.paper_achievement where id = #{id}
select id, name, begin_date, paper_type, record_id, descipline, first_discipline, college_id, paper_source, user_id, information from scientific_research.paper_achievement where user_id = #{id}
select id, name, begin_date, paper_type, record_id, descipline, first_discipline, college_id, paper_source, user_id, information from scientific_research.paper_achievement limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select id, name, begin_date, paper_type, record_id, descipline, first_discipline, college_id, paper_source, user_id, information from scientific_research.paper_achievement
mapper.insert: insert into scientific_research.paper_achievement (id, name,begin_date, paper_type, record_id, descipline, first_discipline, college_id, paper_source, user_id, information) values (#{id},#{name},#{beginDate},#{paperType},#{recordId},#{descipline}, #{firstDiscipline},#{collegeId},#{paperSource},#{userId},#{information})

insert into scientific_research.paper_achievement(name, begin_date, paper_type, record_id, descipline, first_discipline, college_id, paper_source, user_id, information) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.beginDate}, #{entity.paperType}, #{entity.recordId}, #{entity.descipline}, #{entity.firstDiscipline}, #{entity.collegeId}, #{entity.paperSource}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.information})

insert into scientific_research.paper_achievement(name, begin_date, paper_type, record_id, descipline, first_discipline, college_id, paper_source, user_id, information) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.beginDate}, #{entity.paperType}, #{entity.recordId}, #{entity.descipline}, #{entity.firstDiscipline}, #{entity.collegeId}, #{entity.paperSource}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.information})
on duplicate key update name = values(name) , begin_date = values(begin_date) , paper_type = values(paper_type) , record_id = values(record_id) , descipline = values(descipline) , first_discipline = values(first_discipline) , college_id = values(college_id) , paper_source = values(paper_source) , user_id = values(user_id) , information = values(information)
mapper.update:
update scientific_research.paper_achievement
name = #{name},
begin_date = #{beginDate},
paper_type = #{paperType},
record_id = #{recordId},
descipline = #{descipline},
first_discipline = #{firstDiscipline},
college_id = #{collegeId},
paper_source = #{paperSource},
user_id = #{userId},
information = #{information},
where id = #{id}
